answers.answer: The sugar drink is nasty to some mothers like me lol i almost threw up cause it was too sweet they will give u 5 mins to finish it. But if u got diabetes no it will not harm the baby but they will put u on a diet and you will have doctor appointments weekly to monitor ur lil one :)
Oh yea dont eat anything with sugar the day of ur test
And try to keep your carbs down, they turn into sugar
Wow I didn't know that I have toooo much carbs !!
